name: Girlfurriends
description:
A cute visual novel for Pride 2020 that follows the story of 2 Sprinkle Kitties falling in love.

No overly sad endings or angst!!! 

3 endings in all!

Sprinkle Kitties are a closed species created by Ikkuyo and Maemi-tan! Click here for more info!

Bow belongs to Naomi❤
